plot: Flint and Webber are two army vets who devise an ingenious way to make money: they travel across the country and charge anyone willing ten dollars to punch them in the face.
title: Punch Drunk
plot_es: Flint and Webber are two army vets who devise an ingenious way to make money: they travel across the country and charge anyone willing ten dollars to punch them in the face.
plot_en: Flint and Webber are two army vets who devise an ingenious way to make money: they travel across the country and charge anyone willing ten dollars to punch them in the face.
